name: CROUSE COMPANY, INC., Appellant in No. 533, v. CONTROL RESEARCH PRODUCTS, INC.; CONTROL RESEARCH PRODUCTS, INC. v. CROUSE COMPANY, INC. and James Crouse, Appellant in No. 534
name_abbreviation: Crouse Co. v. Control Research Products, Inc.

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY and MANDERINO, JJ.
NIX, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this cage.
parties: CROUSE COMPANY, INC., Appellant in No. 533, v. CONTROL RESEARCH PRODUCTS, INC. CONTROL RESEARCH PRODUCTS, INC. v. CROUSE COMPANY, INC. and James Crouse, Appellant in No. 534.

opinions.text:
ORDER OF COURT
PER CURIAM.
The decree of the court below is affirmed. Each party to bear own costs.
NIX, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this cage.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Peter Flatten, Robert J. Fields, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Henry A. Stein, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
354 A.2d 256
CROUSE COMPANY, INC., Appellant in No. 533, v. CONTROL RESEARCH PRODUCTS, INC. CONTROL RESEARCH PRODUCTS, INC. v. CROUSE COMPANY, INC. and James Crouse, Appellant in No. 534.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 7, 1976.
Peter Flatten, Robert J. Fields, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Henry A. Stein, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY and MANDERINO, JJ.
